attributes.action: say NO to a greater birmingham
attributes.additional_details:
I don't think towns and cities surrounding Birmingham should be swallowed up under the banner of greater Birmingham.
We all have our own identities such as the Black Country and Coventry just to mention a few.
Business men have decided that it would be better for there profits if this were to happen as they believe Birmingham is not known in the wider world so they are willing to sacrifice all the surrounding areas.
If like me you are passionate for your town or city please show your support by signing this petition to try to stop this happening.
